resource.template: <#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_column_def(COL_ID_,NAME_,KEY_,IS_DEFAULT_,TEMPLET_,IS_PUBLIC_,TYPE_,IS_MOBILE_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,SET_TING_) values( <#if COL_ID_??>'${ COL_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${ NAME_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${ KEY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if IS_DEFAULT_??>'${ IS_DEFAULT_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TEMPLET_??>E'${ TEMPLET_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if IS_PUBLIC_??>'${ IS_PUBLIC_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TYPE_??>'${ TYPE_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if IS_MOBILE_??>'${ IS_MOBILE_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SET_TING_??>E'${ SET_TING_}'<#else>''</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_column_temp(ID_,NAME_,KEY_,TEMPLET_,IS_SYS_,STATUS_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,TEMP_TYPE_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${ NAME_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${ KEY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TEMPLET_??>E'${ TEMPLET_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if IS_SYS_??>'${ IS_SYS_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if STATUS_??>'${ STATUS_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TEMP_TYPE_??>'${ TEMP_TYPE_}'<#else>''</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_msg_def(MSG_ID_,COLOR_,URL_,ICON_,CONTENT_,DS_NAME_,DS_ALIAS_,SQL_FUNC_,TYPE_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,COUNT_TYPE_,CREATE_DEP_ID_) values( <#if MSG_ID_??>'${ MSG_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if COLOR_??>'${ COLOR_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if URL_??>'${ URL_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if ICON_??>E'${ ICON_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CONTENT_??>'${ CONTENT_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if DS_NAME_??>'${ DS_NAME_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if DS_ALIAS_??>'${ DS_ALIAS_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if SQL_FUNC_??>E'${ SQL_FUNC_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TYPE_??>'${ TYPE_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if COUNT_TYPE_??>'${ COUNT_TYPE_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_msgbox_box_def(SN_,UPDATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,CREATE_BY_,TENANT_ID_,MSG_ID_,BOX_ID_,ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_) values( <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if MSG_ID_??>'${ MSG_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if BOX_ID_??>'${ BOX_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if ID_??>'${ ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_msgbox_def(BOX_ID_,KEY_,NAME_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,CREATE_DEP_ID_) values( <#if BOX_ID_??>'${ BOX_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${ KEY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${ NAME_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_news(NEW_ID_,SUBJECT_,KEYWORDS_,CONTENT_,SYS_DIC_NEW_,IMG_FILE_ID_,READ_TIMES_,AUTHOR_,STATUS_,FILES_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if NEW_ID_??>'${ NEW_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if SUBJECT_??>'${ SUBJECT_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if KEYWORDS_??>'${ KEYWORDS_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CONTENT_??>E'${ CONTENT_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if SYS_DIC_NEW_??>'${ SYS_DIC_NEW_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if IMG_FILE_ID_??>E'${ IMG_FILE_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if READ_TIMES_??>'${ READ_TIMES_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if AUTHOR_??>'${ AUTHOR_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if STATUS_??>'${ STATUS_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if FILES_??>E'${ FILES_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>,<#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>,<#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>,<#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>,<#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_portal_def(PORT_ID_,NAME_,KEY_,IS_DEFAULT_,LAYOUT_HTML_,PRIORITY_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,IS_MOBILE_,LAYOUT_JSON_) values( <#if PORT_ID_??>'${ PORT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${ NAME_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${ KEY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if IS_DEFAULT_??>'${ IS_DEFAULT_}'<#else>''</#if>,<#if LAYOUT_HTML_??>E'${ LAYOUT_HTML_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if PRIORITY_??>${ PRIORITY_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if IS_MOBILE_??>'${ IS_MOBILE_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if LAYOUT_JSON_??>E'${ LAYOUT_JSON_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>''</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_portal_permission(ID_, LAYOUT_ID_, TYPE_, OWNER_ID_, OWNER_NAME_, TENANT_ID_, CREATE_DEP_ID_, CREATE_BY_, CREATE_TIME_, UPDATE_BY_, UPDATE_TIME_, MENU_TYPE_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if LAYOUT_ID_??>'${ LAYOUT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TYPE_??>'${ TYPE_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if OWNER_ID_??>'${ OWNER_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if OWNER_NAME_??>'${ OWNER_NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if MENU_TYPE_??>'${ MENU_TYPE_}'<#else>''</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO ins_remind_def(ID_,SUBJECT_,URL_,TYPE_,SETTING_,DESCRIPTION_,SN_,ENABLED_,ICON_,DS_NAME_,DS_ALIAS_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,CREATE_DEP_ID_) values( <#if ID_??>'${ ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if SUBJECT_??>'${ SUBJECT_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if URL_??>'${ URL_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TYPE_??>'${ TYPE_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if SETTING_??>E'${ SETTING_?replace("\n","\\n")?replace("\"","\\\"")?replace("'","''")}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if DESCRIPTION_??>'${ DESCRIPTION_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if ENABLED_??>'${ ENABLED_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if ICON_??>'${ ICON_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if DS_NAME_??>'${ DS_NAME_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if DS_ALIAS_??>'${ DS_ALIAS_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>''</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>''</#if>);
